section.title: XML Schemas
section.para:
In all methods XML-data is used as input and output. The related XML-schemas are
http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/item/0.10/item.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/item/0.10/item-list.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/components/0.9/components.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/common/0.4/properties.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/common/0.4/structural-relations.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/common/0.5/md-records.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/common/0.7/content-streams.xsd http://www.escidoc.org/schemas/rest/common/0.3/relations.xsd
